chapters.title: Chapter 19: Awakening
chapters.info: Abell Cauthon, p. 218 (172)—Mat's father. He is the best horse trader in the Two Rivers. He wins the quarterstaff competition at Bel Tine almost every year, and when he does not, Tam al'Thor does. He came to Tar Valon at one point to find out if Mat was still alive. See also Cauthon, Matrim.
